prompt:
How can I write a captivating opening paragraph that sets up my article well?
I am looking for ways to begin each article I write in a compelling manner by setting up the context, topic, and purpose clearly from the get-go so readers are hooked immediately and want to read more. A strong opening often includes a powerful statement, a question that grabs attention, or an interesting anecdote. I want to make my articles memorable and engaging right off the bat to maximize reader engagement.
